sap-sales-order-service.description: SAP S/4HANA Sales Order Management API - Real production service
sample_questions: List all orders for customer ABC123
Show me order items for order 12345
When is order 12345 scheduled for delivery?
What's the total value of order 12345?

northwind-demo.description: Northwind demo service for testing (no authentication required)

integration_with_ai_classifier.description: Integration workflow with your OData AI Classifier project
steps: 1. User asks a natural language question
2. Your AI classifier (odata_model_training.py) determines which service to use
3. The appropriate MCP server configuration is selected
4. MCP server executes the OData operation
5. Results are formatted and returned to user

example_workflow.user_question: Show me sales order 12345 with all line items
example_workflow.expected_response: Sales order details with expanded line items

testing_instructions.step1: Set your SAP credentials: export SAP_USERNAME='your-user' SAP_PASSWORD='your-pass'
testing_instructions.step3: If successful, integrate with your AI classifier
testing_instructions.step4: Use in production with --read-only flag for safety
